articles.title: Lockdown plant sales are booming - so will nurseries still go to Chelsea? - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Will nurseries keep going to Chelsea when it's so much easier to sell plants online?
articles.content:
The Royal Horticultural Society (RHS) describes Chelsea Flower Shows Great Pavilion, where specialist plant nurseries show off their wares, as the jewel in the crown of the event.
